snippet: The flu vaccine is a relatively poor match to a new virus that is currently circulating, health officials said.
abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention says current year's flu season could be deadlier than usual, and that 2014 flu vaccine is relatively poor match to new virus circulating.
lead_paragraph: The flu vaccine is a relatively poor match to a new virus that is currently circulating, health officials said.

headline.main: Deadlier Flu Season Is Possible, C.D.C. Says
headline.print_headline: Deadlier Flu Season Is Possible, C.D.C. Says

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
